onPeerConnected(com.google.android.gms.w.Description: Notification that a peer is now reachable by this node. It may be directly connected to this node or it may be reachable only via a directly connected node. Changes to a node's hop count or nearby status alone will not trigger an @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#NodeApi#NodeListener#onPeerConnected_E@ event as long as the node was already connected. Since multiple nodes can be connected to a network at the same time, peer connected and disconnected events can come in any order.

onPeerDisconnected(com.google.android.gm.Description: Notification that a peer has been disconnected from this node or is no longer reachable by this node. Since multiple nodes can be connected to a network at the same time, peer connected and disconnected events can come in any order.

ClassDesc: Used with @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#NodeApi#addListener_E@ to receive node events.
